snippet.title: The Pirate Queen - A Forgotten Legend | Behind The Scenes with Eloise Singer and Lucy Liu
snippet.description:
🎬 Behind the Scenes with Exec Producers Eloise Singer and Lucy Liu - Crafting The Pirate Queen: A Forgotten Legend 🎬

Get ready to dive into the story of "The Pirate Queen: A Forgotten Legend"! Join us as executive producers Eloise Singer and Lucy Liu take you behind the curtain, to get a glimpse at the story behind this multi-award winning VR Adventure Game.

Don't miss your chance to be part of history - Wishlist now on Steam & Meta Quest
Steam: https://bit.ly/TPQSteam
Meta Quest: https://bit.ly/TPQMetaQuest

 Developed by Singer Studios | Directed by Eloise Singer | Voiced by Lucy Liu 

────────────────────────────────────────────────────

Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in The Pirate Queen: A Forgotten Legend. 

This narrative-driven game invites you to step into the boots of the most feared and respected pirate of all time, Cheng Shih.

Experience a captivating performance from renowned actress Lucy Liu, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, and the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer. 

This is not your typical action-packed pirate game. Instead, it's a rich, immersive storytelling experience that will captivate story seekers and history enthusiasts alike. 

From humble beginnings to the helm of the infamous Red Flag Fleet, navigate through the trials and tribulations on the night Cheng Shih came to power. 

Explore moonlit cabins, climb precarious rigging, tackle puzzles to outsmart adversaries and exercise your wit to seize control of the fleet.

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in a compelling storyline. The game's stunning visuals, atmospheric sound design, and meticulously researched historical context will transport you to the heart of the South China Sea during the Qing dynasty. 

The Pirate Queen: A Forgotten Legend is a game for those who love to lose themselves in a story, crave the thrill of stepping into another time and place, and are eager to chart their course as the most powerful pirate in history. 

Celebrated for its cinematic narrative and historically accurate environments, the game has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) and the Raindance Discovery Award (2021). 

Centred on the pivotal night Cheng Shih ascends to power, this immersive adventure is just the beginning of an expansive Pirate Queen franchise. Created by Singer Studios, executive produced by Lucy Liu and Eloise Singer, the franchise will extend into a visually stunning graphic novel, film and TV series.

Climb aboard and prepare to set sail on a journey of discovery, resilience, and power. The seas are treacherous, but the rewards are great. Do you have what it takes to become The Pirate Queen? 


🌟 Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/TPQSteam
Wishlist on Meta Quest: https://bit.ly/TPQMetaQuest
Find all things The Pirate Queen here: https://linktr.ee/thepiratequeenvr
Find all things Singer Studios here: https://linktr.ee/singerstudios

🔔 Subscribe for Exclusive Updates: https://www.singerstudios.co.uk/work/thepiratequeenforgottenlegend

Join us on this epic journey as we unveil a legend that defied the odds. Wishlist now and be part of history in the making!
